title: Vivo Nex S - CLEAR Edition! - Hidden Camera Exposed
description: The Vivo Nex S is about to be opened up from the inside.  Its time to see how that  hidden camera smartphone from Vivo work, and expose the insides for all to see. This is probably one of the coolest clear smartphones ive ever made. Right up there with the OnePlus 6. Vivo has made some impressive mods to the inside of the Nex phones.  But why hide all of that beautiful engineering? Lets remove the color on the back panel so that we can watch the hidden mechanical camera function while the Vivo Nex S is turned on.
